mapper.sql: a.collect_detail_id AS "collectDetailId", a.subscribe_id AS "subscribeId", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.merchant_user_id AS "merchantUserId", a.collect_amount AS "collectAmount", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.bankcard_no AS "bankcardNo", a.bankcard_owner_mobile AS "bankcardOwnerMobile", a.bankcard_owner_name AS "bankcardOwnerName", a.bankcard_owner_idcard AS "bankcardOwnerIdcard", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_id AS "bankId", a.auth_code AS "authCode", a.merchant_order_no AS "merchantOrderNo", a.status AS "status", a.product_code AS "productCode", a.trans_type AS "transType", a.success_time AS "successTime", a.success_amount AS "successAmount", a.fee_amount AS "feeAmount", a.transfer_from AS "transferFrom"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe_collection_record_detail( collect_detail_id, subscribe_id, merchant_id, merchant_user_id, collect_amount, create_time, update_time, bankcard_no, bankcard_owner_mobile, bankcard_owner_name, bankcard_owner_idcard, bank_name, bank_id, auth_code, merchant_order_no, status, product_code, trans_type, success_time, success_amount, fee_amount ) VALUES ( #{collectDetailId}, #{subscribeId}, #{merchantId}, #{merchantUserId}, #{collectAmount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{bankcardNo}, #{bankcardOwnerMobile}, #{bankcardOwnerName}, #{bankcardOwnerIdcard}, #{bankName}, #{bankId}, #{authCode}, #{merchantOrderNo}, #{status}, #{productCode}, #{transType}, #{successTime}, #{successAmount}, #{feeAmount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE subscribe_collection_record_detail SET collect_detail_id = #{collectDetailId}, subscribe_id = #{subscribeId}, merchant_id = #{merchantId}, merchant_user_id = #{merchantUserId}, collect_amount = #{collectAmount}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, bankcard_no = #{bankcardNo}, bankcard_owner_mobile = #{bankcardOwnerMobile}, bankcard_owner_name = #{bankcardOwnerName}, bankcard_owner_idcard = #{bankcardOwnerIdcard}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_id = #{bankId}, auth_code = #{authCode}, merchant_order_no = #{merchantOrderNo}, status = #{status}, product_code = #{productCode}, trans_type = #{transType}, success_time = #{successTime}, success_amount = #{successAmount}, fee_amount = #{feeAmount} WHERE id = #{id}
